entry.summary:
Vendor: Dirty Bee
Type: Bath & Body
Price: 9.99

Dirty Bee’s Body Butter is handmade of Cocoa Butter, Shea Butter, Red Raspberry Seed Oil and Coconut Oil.  Our All-Natural Body Butter is formulated to give you the perfect amount of moisturizer that your skin so desperately needs without leaving you feeling oily or greasy.

  • Cocoa Butter: It is an antioxidant powerhouse that reduces stretch marks and scars and used as a rich moisturizer, that helps heal sensitive skin.
  • Shea Butter: Using shea butter on your body, especially your face, can condition, tone, and soothe your skin.
  • Red Raspberry Seed Oil: As a great source of antioxidants and vitamins A and E, red raspberry seed oil can slow the aging process, stimulate collagen production, and help your skin appear more youthful and vibrant.
  • Coconut Oil: provides deep moisture without making your skin oily.

Island Pink - Tropical citrus and floral.

Key Information about our Body Butters:

  • Travel Friendly
  • 100% Vegan
  • Animal Cruelty-Free
  • Reusable Container
  • Mother Nature Approved
  • Gluten Free

Ingredients: Water, Cocoa Butter, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ceteareth 20, Flax Seed Oil, Hemp Seed Oil, Fragrance, Sodium Carbomer, Red Raspberry Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol

entry.title: Island Pink Aluminum Free Roll-On Deodorant
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dirty Bee
Type: Bath & Body
Price: 15.99

Dirty Bee Aluminum Free Roll-On Deodorant gives you freedom from the stress of aluminum and the horrible short and long term side effects. 

Your personal microbiome ecosystem is a vital part of your overall health. The microbiome of your armpits is created by the trillions of bacteria and other microorganisms that coexist peacefully. Unlike antiperspirants that disrupt your natural microbiome with toxins and chemicals that kill bacteria, a natural aluminum-free deodorant helps your microbiome thrive and supports the balance of healthy bacteria.

  • Coconut Oil: provides deep moisture without making your skin oily.
  • Shea Butter: Using shea butter on your body, especially your face, can condition, tone, and soothe your skin.
  • Zinc oxide: is a mineral that’s popular as an alternative to triclosan and baking soda in natural products like sunscreen, diaper cream, and shampoo. It works externally by converting the short fatty acids that produce odor-creating bacteria into odorless zinc salts. This safely creates a protective barrier on the skin and reduces odor-causing bacteria by minimizing the growth of new bacteria.
  • Magnesium: One of the most essential yet underrated nutrients out there. It’s needed for more than 300 biochemical reactions, which means that magnesium deficiency causes a wide range of serious health problems. Believe it or not, low magnesium levels may even cause your sweat to smell worse.

    By selecting a natural deodorant that contains magnesium, you effortlessly supplement your body’s magnesium, which helps fight pit odor internally.

Most people weighing the decision to switch to a natural aluminum-free deodorant are concerned about the efficiency of natural deodorant. If you’re one of them, you’ll be surprised to learn that natural deodorant is more effective than standard aluminum-based deodorant, as long as you give your body a few weeks to adjust.

When you start transitioning to natural deodorant, your pores and cells need a few weeks to detox aluminum, parabens, and other common chemicals lurking in your old deodorant. It takes time and patience, but it’s completely worth it in the end to enjoy a deodorant that delivers results without harming your health.

Island Pink - Tropical citrus and floral

Key Information about our Aluminum Free Deodorant:

  • Non- staining
  • Non sticky
  • Easy roll on with spin cap
  • Quick drying

Indregdients: Coconut Oil, Zinc Oxide, Arrowroot Powder, Cetyl Alcohol, Castor Wax, Shea Butter, Cornstarch, Magnesium,  Hydroxide, Fragrance
entry.s:tag: Island Pink Aluminum Free Roll-On Deodorant

entry.title: Island Pink Loofah Soap
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dirty Bee
Type: Soap
Price: 10.99

Say Goodbye to plastic sponges with this plant fiber natural loofah soap! 

Do you want to get rid of stress and tension that you feel on your body? Well, one of the best solutions that you can make is to use the efficient Loofah sponge on your daily shower. It can relive stress and at the same time you can have the chance to achieve a young looking, attractive as well as healthy Skin. With this, you can now level up your beauty and confidence as you walk in front of others. Are you a budget conscious person who has high standards for your beauty and health goals? Then, the Loofah sponge is the perfect one for you!

The Natural Loofah will expand in contact with water. After each use rinse and let it dry out! 

  • The Loofah sponge is composed of slightly rough fibers that are very helpful to exfoliate your skin. In addition to this, it is also beneficial for you to eliminate dead skin cells that will automatically give you smooth, youthful as well as glowing skin. It stimulates your skin's blood circulation.
  •  It stimulates your skin’s blood circulation. The friction that it creates as you use it on your shower will make the blood vessels to properly circulate the blood.
  • The Loofah sponge is biodegradable so you can make sure that it will not cause any damage to the environment as well as to your skin. The best thing about this product is that it can be availed in just a very low cost without sacrificing its high class quality.

Island Pink - Tropical citrus and floral.

Key Information About Our Loofah Soaps:

  • Travel Friendly
  • 100% Vegan
  • Animal Cruelty-Free
  • Reusable Container
  • Mother Nature Approved
  • Gluten Free
  • 100% American Ingredients 
  • 100% Compostable & Biodegradable 

Suggested to change your loofah every 4-6 weeks.

Ingredients: Natural Loofah, Water, Glycerin, Sodium Stearate, Propylene Glycol, Sorbitol, Sodium Laurate, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Stearic Acid, Pentasodium Pentetate, Tetrasodium Etidronate, Fragrance, Ext Violet 2, Green 5

entry.title: Island Pink Body Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dirty Bee
Type: Body Oil
Price: 17.99

Dirty Bee | Body Oil

Island Pink - Tropical citrus and floral.

Body oil helps to lock moisture into your skin for hours. It penetrates your skin’s protective barrier and helps maintain a radiant glow throughout the day. To maximize the amount of moisture your skin retains, remember to cleanse and exfoliate your skin before you apply body oil. Let the oil to soak in for two - three minutes before getting dressed. This way your skin stays moisturized and your clothes stay grease free.

  • Actively helps fade stretch marks.
  • Helps Skin Retain Moisture.
  • By massaging your skin with body oils, you can help to improve your overall health by reducing aches and pains and decreasing stress.
  • Coconut Oil: provides deep moisture without making your skin oily.
  • Red Raspberry Seed Oil: A great source of antioxidants and vitamins A and E, red raspberry seed oil can slow the aging process, stimulate collagen production, and help your skin appear more youthful and vibrant.

Key Information about our Body Oils:

  • Travel Friendly
  • 100% Vegan
  • Animal Cruelty-Free
  • Reusable Container
  • Mother Nature Approved
  • Gluten Free

Ingredients: Fractionated Coconut Oil, Rice Bran Oil, Jojoba Oil, Red Raspberry Seed Oil, Baobab Oil, Fragrance

Made in USA
